sections.heading: authority granted.Section 19-1501 shall be construed as granting additional authority and not as repealing any existing statutory authority

sections.text:
19-1502.Additional authority granted.

Section 19-1501 shall be construed as granting additional authority and not as repealing any existing statutory authority.

SourceLaws 1943, c. 40, § 2, p. 185;R.S.1943, § 19-1502;Laws 2019, LB193, § 120.
